.. _ksctl_self-update:

ksctl self-update
-----------------

update the ksctl cli

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~


setups up update for ksctl cli

::

  ksctl self-update [flags]

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help             help for self-update
  -s, --storage string   storage provider
  -v, --verbose          for verbose output (default true)
